title: Dhaka City Marathon 2025
details: A scenic run through Hatirjheel, Dhanmondi, and Gulshan, featuring live bands and water zones every 3 km.

title: Sundarbans Trail Run
details: Unique off-road marathon through the buffer zones of the Sundarbans, with eco-themed medals and mangrove tree planting.

title: Sylhet Tea Garden Marathon
details: Run across rolling tea gardens and hilly terrain. Includes local cultural performances and Sylheti cuisine stalls.

title: Cox’s Bazar Beach Run 2025
details: Race along the world's longest sea beach. Includes barefoot category and post-run beach yoga.

title: Rajshahi Heritage Marathon
details: Experience the beauty of historic mosques, Padma River views, and mango orchard trails.

title: Padma Bridge Run 2025
details: A once-in-a-lifetime experience to run across the iconic Padma Bridge at sunrise. Includes drone photography and medal ceremony.
